posts.name: Blackbrick
posts.note: Blackbrick is a chef-owned Chinese restaurant serving dim sum, mains, and wine in a funky, contemporary space. You should order the Har Gow Shrimp Dumpling, Xinjiang Cumin-Lamb Dumpling, Dan Dan Mian, Gong Bao Rabbit, Grandma's Red Oxtail, General Tso's Florida Gator.

posts.name: Blue Beer Garden
posts.note: Blue Beer Garden is the coolest hidden Gem and Bar of Miami Beach. Located inside the New Hotel, Blue Beer Garden offers a variety of locally brewed beers and many different types of specialty cocktails and drinks, as well as a variety of delicious dishes that will excite your taste buds. No matter your preference, our gastropub will have a dish for you. Order the spicy linguine and clams or the seafood paella if it's still on the menu.

posts.name: Blue Collar
posts.note: Blue Collar serves comfort-food favorites are bumped up a notch at this American restaurant with '70s-inspired style. They're a small restaurant located in the historic MIMO district of Miami that serves food that people like to eat. Which includes a daily rotation of braised dishes, parmesans, ribs, and an unprecedented variety of vegetables. You need to order the Big Ragout Sandwich which is served in a hollowed-out crusty bread, with pork and veal shoulder, and brisket along with provolone and parmesan cheese.

posts.name: La Sandwicherie
posts.note: La Sandwicherie is a no-frills counter space dispensing gourmet sandwiches on French bread plus salads and smoothies. As their name states get yourself some sandwiches. NOTE: The have multiple locations.

posts.name: The Local Craft Food and Drink
posts.note: The Local Craft Food and Drink is a welcoming spot for elevated comfort food, craft beer, and cocktails in snug, exposed-brick quarters. You need to order the Hen Dumpling Soup, Bone Marrow, and the Lamb Belly BLT.

posts.name: Miami Smokers - Urban Smokehouse
posts.note: Miami Smokers - Urban Smokehouse is a rustic HQ for cured and smoked heritage-breed pork products, like slab bacon, prosciutto, and sausage. You need to order the bacon wrapped plantains or a charcuterie plate or a wild boar sausage.

posts.name: Mr. and Mrs. Bun
posts.note: Gian Carlo Accinelli and his wife are putting their love on the line all in the name of their buns at Mr. and Mrs. Bun. The Peruvian couple serve all of their unique sandwiches on their signature, house-made buns. For the Asado con Palta sandwich, slow-cooked eye of round is piled on a fresh bun with avocado and crispy onions and then served with the jus from the cooked meat. Orderthe Asado con Palta, Pollo Chi Jao Kai, or Aji de Gallina Bites.

posts.name: Whisk Gourmet
posts.note: Whisk Gourmet is a modern and spacious cafe serving American dishes with Southern flair, plus gourmet take-home meals. Order the deep-fried fish or the beer braised pork ribs.

posts.name: Yardbird Southern Table and Bar
posts.note: Yardbird Southern Table and Bar is a rustic outpost attracting foodies with inventive farm-to-table Southern comfort food and bourbon bar. You need to order the deviled eggs and the shrimp and grits. NOTE: They have other locations around the United States.
